courses.course_desc: This course provides students with instruction in vocabulary, reading comprehension, critical reading, study skills, and test-taking skills based on their TSI-A scores. Concurrent enrollment in specific sections of general education courses is required. Credit earned for this course does not count toward degrees offered by the university.  Corequisite: ENG 1310 with a grade of "D" or better.
courses.course_credits:
3 Credit Hours 
3 Lecture Contact Hours 
0 Lab Contact Hours
courses.course_attributes: Course Attribute(s): Exclude from 3-peat Processing|Developmental/Remedial|Multicultural Perspective|Multicultural Content
